title: Quiet in the Corner
description: From the author of Lost in Yaba and Pattaya Youtuber, Quiet in the Corner is Walt Gleeson's candid and vivid account of his troubled adolescence. Not only does Walt have to battle an eating disorder, he has to watch his family fall into turmoil as his brother turns to drugs. A warts-and-all, intimate portrayal of a family in crisis.
author: Walt Gleeson
